sentences.en: A new designated verifier proxy signature scheme with message recovery was proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种具有消息恢复的指定验证者的代理签名方案.

sentences.en: A normal proxy can tunnel encrypted data, but it cannot cache it.
sentences.cn: 正常可以.加密数据, 但不能缓存它.

sentences.en: Does the proxy service allow connections from this network?
sentences.cn: Proxy代理伺服器允许连接这个网路 吗 ?

sentences.en: Freezing enemy maneuver gave the proxy ground troops the ability to mass.
sentences.cn: 冻结敌行动,使代理人部队能够集结.

sentences.en: In Class View, examine the proxy classes created for each connection point.
sentences.cn: 在类视图中, 检查为每个连接点创建的代理类.

sentences.en: Price differences are used as a proxy for differences in quality.
Prof Kramer named Condoleezza Rice as George W. Bush's proxy bully.
sentences.cn: 克雷默教授点名指出,康多莉扎? 赖斯(CondoleezzaRice)就是布什总统的霸王代理人.

sentences.en: Proxy server is unavailable. Try connecting to proxy XX again?
sentences.cn: Proxy服务器无效. 尝试重新连接到代理XX 吗 ?

sentences.en: The browser is configured to use a proxy server, but the proxy refused a connection.
sentences.cn: 浏览器设定使用Proxy代理伺服器, 但Proxy代理伺服器拒绝了连线.

sentences.en: The proxy server received an invalid response from an upstream server.
sentences.cn: 代理服务器接收到了来自逆行服务器(总服务器)的无效回答.

sentences.en: Those not attending the meeting may vote by proxy.
sentences.cn: 那些未出席会议的可以请他人代为投票。

sentences.en: We have established PROXY server also , connected with JH 163 phone line and accomplished connecting with Internet.
sentences.cn: 我们还建立了PROXY服务器, 通过电话线与JH163相连,实现了与Internet的连接.

sentences.en: You are online ( proxy: manual ). Click the icon to go offline.
sentences.cn: 您现在联机 ( 代理: 手动 ). 点击此图标即可脱机.

sentences.en: You can vote either in person or by proxy .
sentences.cn: 你可以亲自投票或请人代理。

sentences.en: You may appoint a proxy to vote for you.
sentences.cn: 你可以委托他人代你投票.

trans.tran_cn: 代表权，代理人，代替物，委托书，代理服务器
trans.tran_en: if you do something by proxy, you arrange for someone else to do it for you
